title: Samsung Galaxy M16's leaked renders reveal its design and colors
description: About a month ago, we saw the Samsung Galaxy M16 on Geekbench, and now we are looking at its leaked renders, which revealed its design and colors. The Samsung Galaxy M16 will come in three colors, and its front design is similar to the Samsung Galaxy M15 since it packs an AMOLED display with an Infinity-U notch. Around the back, the M16 has three cameras aligned vertically in the left corner, like the M15, but this time they are placed inside a camera island. excerpt: The renders show us the Galaxy M16 in three colors. About a month ago, we saw the Samsung Galaxy M16 on Geekbench, and now we are looking at its leaked...
text: About a month ago, we saw the Samsung Galaxy M16 on Geekbench, and now we are looking at its leaked renders, which revealed its design and colors. The Samsung Galaxy M16 will come in three colors, and its front design is similar to the Samsung Galaxy M15 since it packs an AMOLED display with an Infinity-U notch. Around the back, the M16 has three cameras aligned vertically in the left corner, like the M15, but this time they are placed inside a camera island. Samsung Galaxy M16's leaked renders The Samsung Galaxy M16's rear panel is also flat and doesn't have textured patterns on it. What's also flat are the M16's frames, with the left-side frame housing the SIM card slot and the right frame sporting the volume rocker and power button with a fingerprint scanner embedded. Samsung Galaxy M15 • Samsung Galaxy M16 While the source didn't share the Samsung Galaxy M16's specs sheet, Geekbench revealed the smartphone would come with the Dimensity 6300 SoC, Android 14, and 8GB RAM. However, there could be more RAM options that are yet to be confirmed. Source
html:
About a month ago, we saw the Samsung Galaxy M16 on Geekbench, and now we are looking at its leaked renders, which revealed its design and colors.

The Samsung Galaxy M16 will come in three colors, and its front design is similar to the Samsung Galaxy M15 since it packs an AMOLED display with an Infinity-U notch. Around the back, the M16 has three cameras aligned vertically in the left corner, like the M15, but this time they are placed inside a camera island.


Samsung Galaxy M16's leaked renders

The Samsung Galaxy M16's rear panel is also flat and doesn't have textured patterns on it. What's also flat are the M16's frames, with the left-side frame housing the SIM card slot and the right frame sporting the volume rocker and power button with a fingerprint scanner embedded.


Samsung Galaxy M15 • Samsung Galaxy M16

While the source didn't share the Samsung Galaxy M16's specs sheet, Geekbench revealed the smartphone would come with the Dimensity 6300 SoC, Android 14, and 8GB RAM. However, there could be more RAM options that are yet to be confirmed.

Source
